City Council Members
====================

[![Mayor Clyde C. Hairston](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=18277 "Mayor Clyde C. Hairston")](mailto:chairston@lancaster-tx.com)

Clyde C. Hairston [Biography](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/DocumentCenter/View/16357/Mayor-Hairston)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Mayor

[Email](mailto:chairston@lancaster-tx.com)

All correspondences for City council members should be addressed to:

**211 N. Henry St.**

**PO Box 940,  
Lancaster, TX 75146**

For additional information, please contact the City Secretary's Office at **972-218-1309 or email: citysecretary@lancaster-tx.com**

[![District 1 - Councilmember Strain-Burk](https://www.lancaster-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=18278 "District 1 - Councilmember Strain-Burk")](mailto:cstrainburk@lancaster-tx.com)
